meanings: 군사 joint combined electronic warfare element (JCEWE)

vlive.korean: [합동작전 펼치려는 미미즈] 나 도와준다고 생각... [BAMBAM and YUGYEOM tries to cooperate] I didn't think about helping... 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) MONOGRAPH "DYE" EP.01
vlive.english: [BAMBAM and YUGYEOM tries to cooperate] I didn't think about helping...

vlive.korean: 오늘은 합동수업이다! Today, we're going to have a joint class. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 나를 괴롭히던 일진의 과거는? [일진에게 찍혔을 때] EP05
vlive.english: Today, we're going to have a joint class.

vlive.korean: "합동 무대 하면 어떤 콘셉트로?" - 어떤 콘셉트로? "What concept do you want for joint performance"? - What concept? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 아기다리고기다리던공공즈😁
vlive.english: "What concept do you want for joint performance"? - What concept?

vlive.korean: 합동해야 돼요. We need to be together. 듣기 View video Apink : 뽐뽐뽐보미💜
여러분들 예전에 둘이서 합동 무대를 한 적 있습니다! have even done a joint performance together! 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#160. 윙 가르디움 라비오우사 (w. 라비 of 빅스)
vlive.english: have even done a joint performance together!

examples.korean: a pro-am golf tournament 발음듣기 프로-아마 합동 토너먼트 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a joint declaration renouncing the use of violence 발음듣기 폭력 사용을 중단하겠다는 합동 선언 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a joint declaration renouncing the use of violence 발음

examples.korean: They issued a joint statement denying the charges. 발음듣기 그들은 그 혐의를 부인하는 합동 성명을 발표했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They issued a joint statement denying the charges. 발음

examples.korean: the issue of a joint statement by the French and German foreign ministers 발음듣기 프랑스와 독일 외무장관의 합동 담화 발표 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the issue of a joint statement by the French and German foreign ministers 발음

examples.korean: a pamphlet produced by the government in coordination with the Sports Council 발음듣기 정부가 스포츠 위원회와 합동으로 펴낸 안내 책자 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
